Title: How to Obtain a Topic Link on Xiaohongshu
Content: To obtain a topic link on Xiaohongshu, follow these steps. First, open the Xiaohongshu app and locate the search icon (a magnifying glass) in the top right corner. Click on it and enter the topic you are interested in, such as 'CET-4' or 'Postgraduate Exam'. After searching, you will see a list of posts related to your topic. Select a post with a high number of likes, as these are more likely to be relevant and popular. Open the post and look for the hashtags (preceded by a '#') within the content. These hashtags represent the topics associated with the post. Click on the desired hashtag, which will take you to a page displaying all posts under that topic. In the top right corner of this page, click the share button and select 'Copy Link'. You now have the topic link, which you can use for further analysis or content creation.

By leveraging topic links, you can ensure your content is relevant and appealing, increasing your chances of gaining visibility and engagement on Xiaohongshu.
